Dani Gaumond


Dani Gaumond, City Council Position 1

Phone: 360-629-2181
Term: 2026 to 2029
Email Dani Gaumond

Biography

Dani moved to the Stanwood area in 1981 when she was 10 years old and graduated from Stanwood High School.  Dani has been self-employed, owning her cleaning business since 1998. She has two daughters, the oldest graduated from Stanwood High School in 2010, and her youngest is currently in 4th grade.

 

Dani has enjoyed serving on City Council, Position 1, since 2022. She has served on the Community Development, Public Safety, Public Works, and Finance & Personnel committees. 


She enjoys volunteering at the local food bank and at her youngest daughter's elementary school. In her free time, she enjoys painting, reading and spending time with family and friends.

 

Dani says "Stanwood is a great place to raise a family with a rich history, caring community and a small-town feel.  I am blessed to call Stanwood my home."
